column1: Local Foods////Local Foods is my all time favorite sandwich place in Houston! Their sandwiches are relatively healthy and you can taste the quality and freshness of all the ingredients. My top 3 sandwiches are the crunchy chicken
column3: and the shrimp & crab.  The sides change seasonally but I always look forward to seeing the chicken lemongrass soup on the menu. For any Thai food lovers
column4: this soup is to die for.  It has creaminess from the coconut milk and the tangy from the lemongrass making it a winning combo. I also like the beet sides as well. Next time you are near a Local Foods it is worth trying.
